name: Wanderlust (itch)
description:
**Currently In Development**

Wanderlust is a simple puzzler designed to test and hopefully improve your visual memory.

Single Player

Watch closely as the a path is revealed and swiftly hidden. As accurately as possible, uncover the path and progress your level.

Local Multiplayer

Remember where the barriers are. Take turns to reveal squares - the player with the most wins!

More game modes and features to come.

Available for:

  • Android (optimised for tablets)
  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux

For progress updates visit lizthrelfo.com

*** v0.31 ***

  • New 'Local Multiplayer' mode
  • Additional, more challenging levels added to single player
  • Overall UI and Performance improvements
